name: optics-sym
description: Lightweight, static web app that simulates rays interacting with mirrors, lenses, and beam splitters.

scripts.build: npm run generate:icons && mkdir -p www && cp -R index.html app.js style.css manifest.webmanifest sw.js offline.html www/ && mkdir -p www/icons && cp -R assets/appicons/icon-180.png assets/appicons/icon-192.png assets/appicons/icon-512.png www/icons/
